markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Investiture](/Feats.aspx?ID=5161) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 256 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Charisma +3

</column>

---

You have an incredible ability to invest more magic items. Increase your limit on invested items from 10 to 12. Investing worn magic items is explained on page 219 of GM Core.
name: Incredible Investiture
